title: Integrate GUI with protocol_ai backend
description: Connect GUI components to ModuleLoader, TriggerEngine, Orchestrator, and LLMInterface. Handle async model loading, streaming responses, and error states.

title: Build module trigger debugger view
description: Create detailed view showing why modules were/weren't triggered, keyword matches found, regex patterns tested. Include step-by-step arbitration decision log.

title: Design modular tools architecture and plugin system
description: Create tools framework with base Tool class, plugin discovery, registration system. Define standard interface for tool execution, input validation, and result formatting. Support async execution and timeouts.

title: Create Tier 3 heuristic modules
description: Implement contextual modules: SemanticEntropyTracker, NarrativeCollapseDetection. These provide pattern analysis without veto power.

title: Build prompt input interface with syntax highlighting
description: Create multi-line text input with syntax highlighting, auto-completion for module triggers, character count, and clear/reset functionality.

title: Create CrossModuleSynthesisProtocol module (Tier 3)
description: Synthesize insights across multiple triggered modules. Identify patterns visible only when combining multiple analytical lenses.

title: Add file system tool for sandbox operations
description: Create tool for reading/writing files within sandbox. Support text and binary files, directory listing, file search. Include file size limits and extension validation.

title: Add keyboard shortcuts and accessibility features
description: Implement keyboard navigation, shortcuts (Ctrl+Enter to submit, Ctrl+K for settings, etc.). Add screen reader support and focus indicators.

title: Design loading states and animations
description: Create smooth animations for module triggers, loading spinners for model inference, transition effects. Use subtle animations that enhance UX without distraction.

title: Build conversation history panel with search
description: Create scrollable history of prompts/responses with timestamps, module activations. Include search/filter, export to file, and clear history.

title: Create DecentralizationTheatreDetection module (Tier 2)
description: Identify false decentralization claims. Detect centralized control behind decentralized facades in organizations and systems.

title: Add main block with end-to-end demonstration
description: Implement __main__ block that demonstrates full pipeline: initialize components, process sample prompt, print response.

title: Create LLMInterface class with ctransformers
description: Implement LLMInterface using ctransformers library. Load GGUF models with AutoModel.from_pretrained(). Implement execute() method for inference.

title: Implement web search tool
description: Create web search tool supporting multiple search engines (DuckDuckGo, Google, Bing). Return structured results with titles, snippets, URLs. Include rate limiting, caching, and error handling.

title: Create DisplacementCostAuditModule module (Tier 3)
description: Analyze who bears costs of changes vs who receives benefits. Detect cost externalization and benefit concentration.

title: Create regression test framework
description: Build system to capture failed prompts and create regression tests. Ensure fixes don't reintroduce old bugs.

title: Design settings panel for LLM configuration
description: Build settings interface for model path, GPU layers (auto/manual), temperature, context length, max tokens. Include GPU detection status and VRAM usage display.

title: Design main dashboard layout and navigation
description: Design primary window layout with sidebar navigation, header bar, and main content area. Include module status overview, GPU/system stats widget, and quick actions panel.

title: Create SymbolicCapitalAudit module (Tier 2)
description: Analyze symbolic capital accumulation and deployment. Detect credibility exploitation and authority-from-association patterns.

title: Create EthicalManipulationDetection module (Tier 2)
description: Identify manipulation disguised as ethics. Detect moral licensing, ethics washing, and weaponized virtue signaling.

title: Build tools management GUI panel
description: Create UI for enabling/disabling tools, configuring tool settings, viewing tool capabilities. Show tool status (available/busy/error), execution history, and usage statistics.

title: Design tier hierarchy visualization
description: Create visual representation of tier system (Tier 0-4) with color coding, active module indicators, and arbitration flow diagram showing which module won and why.

title: Create ModuleLoader class to load YAML module definitions
description: Implement ModuleLoader class that loads module YAML files from ./modules/ directory structure. Should parse YAML and return structured module data.

title: Create StructurelessTyrannyDetectionModule module (Tier 3)
description: Detect 'tyranny of structurelessness' - informal power hierarchies masquerading as flat organizations.

title: Create StructuralFinalityEnforcer module (Tier 1)
description: Prevent conversational drift after structural completion. Blocks engagement bait and ensures responses end when analysis is complete.

title: Create SelectorateTheoryModule module (Tier 3)
description: Apply selectorate theory analysis to power structures. Examine whose support is needed for power retention and how this shapes behavior.

title: Implement sandboxed code execution tool
description: Create secure code execution tool restricted to ./sandbox/ folder. Support Python execution with restricted imports, timeout enforcement, resource limits (CPU/memory). Log all file operations and prevent path traversal.

title: Create sample YAML module files
description: Create example modules: ./modules/tier2/griftdetection.yaml and ./modules/tier4/blunttone.yaml based on prompt.txt reference.

title: Document Core Directive and Guiding Principles
description: Create formal documentation (constitution.yaml or config) defining Core Directive and 4 Guiding Principles: Behavior over Intent, Precision over Consensus, Power Scrutiny, Structural Transparency.

title: Add module dependency resolution
description: Implement dependency handling so modules can require other modules to run first. Update Orchestrator to resolve and execute dependencies in correct order.

title: Package GUI app for Windows distribution
description: Create standalone executable with PyInstaller or similar. Include app icon, installer, auto-updater. Ensure CUDA libraries are bundled correctly.

title: Add advanced trigger matching capabilities
description: Enhance TriggerEngine with stemming, lemmatization, synonym matching beyond simple keyword search. Use NLP libraries like NLTK or spaCy for robust trigger detection.

title: Integrate tools with LLM prompt assembly
description: Modify Orchestrator to detect tool invocations in LLM responses, execute tools, and feed results back into prompt. Support multi-turn tool usage and tool chaining.

title: Create HistoricalAmnesiaDetection module (Tier 2)
description: Detect selective historical framing and context erasure. Identify pattern of ignoring relevant precedents and historical parallels.

title: Implement bundle management interface
description: Build UI for creating, loading, and managing module bundles (e.g., coding bundle, analysis bundle). Show which modules are in each bundle with drag-and-drop editing.

title: Create real-time system status monitor
description: Build status bar showing GPU usage, VRAM, model load status, active modules count. Include animated loading indicators and health checks.

title: Create ImpactMatrixProtocol module (Tier 3)
description: Map actual vs stated impacts across stakeholder groups. Create structured impact analysis matrix.

title: Create DataEthicsAudit module (Tier 2)
description: Examine data collection, retention, and usage practices. Detect surveillance capitalism patterns and data exploitation strategies.

title: Create TrajectoryAuditModule module (Tier 3)
description: Examine long-term trajectories and systemic momentum. Analyze where current paths lead vs stated intentions.

title: Create DriftContainmentProtocol module (Tier 3)
description: Monitor and contain subtle deviations from core behavioral directives over session. Detect conversational, tonal, and analytical drift.

title: Create CoercionStructureDetection module (Tier 2)
description: Detect structural coercion patterns including manufactured urgency, false scarcity, and power asymmetries in decision-making contexts.

title: Create CovertShieldDetection module (Tier 3)
description: Identify protective mechanisms that shield powerful actors from scrutiny while exposing less powerful actors.

title: Implement Output Audit & Finalization system
description: Add post-LLM response auditing (Phase 2 Step F). Check if LLM followed instructions, detect refusals, identify hallucinations, verify Tier 1 compliance. Support regeneration on failure.

title: Create additional Tier 2 analytical modules
description: Implement core analysis modules: CultDetection, ConsentArchitectureAudit, SymmetryTestEnforcer, PropagandaDetection. Reference prompt.txt for module specifications.

title: Add tool result visualization in response display
description: Enhance response display to show tool executions: search results in cards, code execution output with syntax highlighting, file operations log. Include expand/collapse for large results.

title: Add module versioning and metadata system
description: Implement version tracking for modules, conflict detection, and metadata management. Support module updates without breaking existing configs.

title: Build response display with module trace visualization
description: Design response viewer showing LLM output, triggered modules, arbitration results, and tier hierarchy. Include markdown rendering and copy-to-clipboard.

title: Create FictionalFramingAudit module (Tier 1)
description: Detect attempts to use 'hypothetical' or 'fictional' framing to bypass ethics. Prevents 'in a story' or 'for educational purposes' manipulation attempts.

title: Create BiasMirrorModule module (Tier 3)
description: Reflect back implicit biases in prompts and reasoning. Make unstated assumptions explicit.

title: Build visual module editor with YAML preview
description: Create GUI editor for module YAML files with form-based editing (name, tier, triggers, templates). Include live YAML preview and validation.

title: Create Tier 1 safety modules
description: Implement critical Tier 1 modules: EthicalInversionInterdiction, AntiHallucinationComplianceOverride, DoNotHarm. These are non-negotiable safety rules.

title: Enhance error handling and logging
description: Add comprehensive error handling, logging system with verbosity levels, and detailed debugging information for troubleshooting module conflicts and LLM failures.

title: Create MoralLaunderingDetection module (Tier 2)
description: Detect reputation laundering through association with ethical causes. Identify 'ethics theater' that obscures harmful behavior.

title: Create PublicFigureFocusEnforcer module (Tier 1)
description: Enforce power-scaled scrutiny - higher power = higher scrutiny. Ensure public figures with more power receive more rigorous analysis than private citizens.

title: Implement Tier 0 user command system
description: Add user command handlers for /load_bundle, /full_sweep, /help and other Tier 0 commands that override all automated analysis.

title: Create Orchestrator class with hierarchical arbitration
description: Implement main Orchestrator class with process_prompt() method. Execute trigger analysis, hierarchical tier-based arbitration (lowest tier wins), assemble final prompt, and get LLM response.

title: Create ModuleSweepEnforcer module (Tier 1)
description: Enforce comprehensive analysis mode when triggered. Ensures all relevant modules are activated for thorough examination.

title: Select GUI framework and establish dark mode design system
description: Choose GUI framework (PyQt6, CustomTkinter, or Electron). Define dark mode color palette, typography, spacing system, and component library. Create design tokens and style guide.

title: Create sandbox folder management system
description: Implement sandbox folder creation, cleanup, and permissions management. Auto-create ./sandbox/ on startup, enforce read-only outside sandbox, provide file browser for sandbox contents.

title: Create TriggerEngine class for keyword matching
description: Implement TriggerEngine that takes user prompt and loaded modules, returns list of active modules via case-insensitive keyword search.

title: Create bundle system for pre-loaded configurations
description: Implement bundle loading mechanism to activate groups of modules for specific contexts (e.g., coding bundle, analysis bundle).

title: Build test suite runner interface
description: Create GUI for running Red Team tests, viewing pass/fail results, comparing expected vs actual module triggers. Include test result history and export.

title: Build Red Team test corpus
description: Develop comprehensive test suite with: symmetry tests (A/B prompts), bypass attempts, subtlety tests, domain-specific tests. Create test framework to run corpus.

title: Create module library browser and manager
description: Build interface to browse all modules, filter by tier, enable/disable modules, view triggers and purposes. Show module dependency graph visualization.

title: Add llama-cpp-python with CUDA support
description: Replace ctransformers with llama-cpp-python for better CUDA support on Windows. Detect GPU and configure appropriate layers.
